item.title: Hey There! :wave:
item.description: I’m your host, Nicholas. Welcome to my little corner of the internet. 🏕️ I mostly write about code & technology. It ain’t much, but it’s honest work. 😄 Do take a look around - grab a ☕, relax ⛱️, and enjoy your stay!
